plays.text: Penalty to Vernon Fiddler 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Manny Legace
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Scott Nichol
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Interference Scott Nichol
Penalty to Marek Zidlicky 2 minutes for Hooking Johan Franzen
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Mathieu Schneider assisted by Henrik Zetterberg AND Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Interference Scottie Upshall
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Holding Adam Hall
Penalty to Scott Walker 2 minutes for Holding Johan Franzen
Penalty to Adam Hall 2 minutes for Roughing Mikael Samuelsson
Penalty to Paul Kariya 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Williams
Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Dan Hamhuis
Penalty to Jerred Smithson 2 minutes for Hooking Mikael Samuelsson
Penalty to Mikael Samuelsson 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike - Diving Jerred Smithson
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Holding Steve Yzerman
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Holding Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Crosschecking Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Mark Eaton 2 minutes for Hooking Mikael Samuelsson
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Holding Vernon Fiddler
Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for Interference Adam Hall
Goal scored by Paul Kariya assisted by Marek Zidlicky AND Kimmo Timonen
